org.smartfrog.services.dns
Interface DNSNamed

All Superinterfaces:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Diagnostics, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Liveness, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim, java.rmi.Remote, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelper, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTagsComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Update
All Known Implementing Classes:
DNSBindNamedImpl, DNSNamedImpl
public interface DNSNamed
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim

A remote interface to a "named" DNS server that allows to manage it.

Method Summary
 void cleanUp()
          Stops the daemon, cleans up all the configuration changes using dynamic updates, and patches the "fresh" config files so that it can be re-started in a known state.

          Flushes all the caches.

Method Detail

updateConfigData

DNSData updateConfigData(DNSData newData)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Updates the internal configuration data reflecting a change in zones/views/options...

Parameters:
newData - A hierarchy of data reflecting the current configuration state.
Returns:
The old configuration that is being replaced.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot change the configuration.

cleanUp

void cleanUp()
             throws DNSException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Stops the daemon, cleans up all the configuration changes using dynamic updates, and patches the "fresh" config files so that it can be re-started in a known state.

Throws:
DNSException - Error while stopping/cleaning the named daemon.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs

start

void start()
           throws DNSException,
                  java.rmi.RemoteException
Starts the named daemon unless it is already started.

Throws:
DNSException - Error while starting the named daemon.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs

stop

void stop()
          throws DNSException,
                 java.rmi.RemoteException
Stops the named daemon assuming it is currently running.

Throws:
DNSException - Error while stopping the named daemon.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

flush

void flush()
           throws DNSException,
                  java.rmi.RemoteException
Flushes all the caches. This allows forward views or zones to ensure they will get the most up to date information.

Throws:
DNSException - Error while flushing caches in the named daemon.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if a network error occurs

status

boolean status()
               throws DNSException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the status of the named daemon.

Returns:
True if the named daemon is up, false otherwise.
Throws:
DNSException - Error while trying to find the status of the named daemon.
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs
